body: I got the following warning "1. The calculation has been terminated by the user!" when using the PMV comfort calculator. Posts related to this issue don't seem to provide an explanation for the data i have. Can anybody kindly advise? Thanks! topic: [bug fixed] PMV calculator warning: "1. The calculation has been terminated by the user!"
